title: Instructional Design Based on the ADDIE Model to Enhance Elementary Cultural Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational concepts in elementary education and cultural literacy
context.additional_context: Literacy education design competency enhancement program for science professionals, utilizing regional cultural heritage

learning_goals: Learners can create an educational program design document by applying the five phases of the ADDIE model (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation).
Learners can develop elementary literacy education materials (such as illustrated dictionaries) that reflect local cultural elements.
Learners can design project-based assessment tools that strengthen scientific literacy in multicultural environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
